work.description: Live streaming integrated into the Xbox gaming ecosystem.
work.summary: Continued engineering duties after immigration to the US.
highlights: Advanced integrations with Azure cloud technologies with a focus on storage and service communication technologies.
Rebuilding Mixer’s payment systems which handle up to thousands of transactions per hour.
Large contributions to highly scalable user incentives/retention systems.
Mentoring new team members on legacy and up and coming technologies.

work.description: Live streaming integrated into the Xbox gaming ecosystem.
work.summary: After Beam LLC was acquired my Microsoft, I was hired as a full time employee. Responsible for various integrations into the Xbox ecosystem.
highlights: Integration of pre-acquisition services with existing Xbox system.
Mentor a rapidly growing team on existing systems.
Large contributions to highly scalable user incentives/retention systems.
Large scale modernisations of various services.
Enhance various existing services to scale for a rapidly growing customer base.

work.summary: Beam LLC was an independent live streaming platform that was eventually acquired by Microsoft and later rebranded to `Mixer`.
highlights: Plan, architect and implement scalable features in both monolithic and micro services in NodeJS, golang and other common web technologies.
Implemented automatic code quality guidelines using automated code analysis, strict testing and coverage checking.
Contribute to open source software, both our own and third party.
Revamp internal and 3rd party developer documentation.
Tiered user report and escalation system.

work.description: Automatic customer data synchronisation across various indexing websites across Europe.
work.summary: Following successful contract work, Omnea hired me to work as a full time employee on-site.
highlights: Handle sanitation and synchronisation of millions of sets of customer data.
Integrate with dozens of third party APIs to synchronize customer data on their behalf.

work.description: Automatic customer data synchronisation across various indexing websites across Europe.
work.summary: I was hired as a contractor to build a search engine and web crawler for small to medium sized businesses located in central Europe.
highlights: Implementation, maintenance and administration of external APIs in JavaScript/Coffee-Script and PHP.
Web scraping, indexing and sanitation of various websites, making the data accessible and useful to Omnea.
Implementation of marketing tools using JavaScript, PhantomJS/WebDriver.

work.summary: Contracted as general purpose web developer.
highlights: Implementation of themes for blogs and other websites using PHP and JavaScript.
Creation of a file system management UI in JavaScript.

volunteer.organization: Reno Area Anthropomorphic Arts and Recreations

highlights: Providing great customer experience before and at convention for signups.
Zero downtime during events.
Live business analytics.
